website_summaries.verdict: One kit that includes more advanced components with a much smaller, budget-friendly price tag.
pros: Comes with an extremely detailed and clear instruction guide
The guide is broken down into 28 specific lessons so you will learn basic and advance Arduino concepts all from one kit
cons: The kit pieces are easy to lose when not organized

customer_reviews.title: Good educational product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to teach my 2 eldest boys (10 & 8) the basics of putting together circuits following the drawings & diagrams in the tutorials. They both picked it up very quickly & by lesson 11 ready didn't need my guidance at all. I'm hoping this will be a start in developing an interest in learning electronics and/or programming. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work with any Apple computer we have in our house
customer_reviews.text: Although Arduino can work with Macs, apparently sometimes it has problems finding the port. We constructed this and then tried it on two different laptops and a desktop. On all three, the programs wouldn't upload to the arduino. Very very disappointing. The book we have even used a Mac as it's example so it's obviously possible. I'm giving it three stars because it came with everything it had and construction of the materials themselves was easy. But it seems possible that this product in particular isn't interfacing well with Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: mom to a boy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: The set was a day late in arriving but I was promptly notified by Amazon. The documentation that came with the set was pretty skimpy, the grammar was terrible, but wow! what a great set! I mean, I know absolutely NOTHING about Arduino except that I want to find out how it all works. I am now the proud owner of a huge assortment of wonderful doo-dads, gizmos and thingamabobs about which I know absolutely nothing, with few exceptions , but I'm looking forward to learning!
customer_reviews.author: minda morton

customer_reviews.title: Great arduino starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, comes with lots of extras that most kits dont include like, mounting board, instructional CD, joystick, servo, remote control, stepper motor, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Endless options for so many building blocks!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! I've been programming with Arduino for awhile so already have an understanding of hooking up power, configuring libraries, getting sensors to talk, etc... Whether you're experienced or are just getting started, this bundle has a ton of great components to play with. It reminds me of getting a nice Lego set when I was a kid. You can take everything apart and put back together to make sooooo many things :)
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Having a ball
customer_reviews.text: I am having a ball with the Arduino kit. I am retiring soon and I am making a new hobby of the Athirduino and the Raspberry Pi. I hope to teach classes at the local library as well as Java and or C++ I want to build robots also. This is a great starter kit. Fun and enlightening.
customer_reviews.author: Acetek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Start
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t gotten much use out of the kit yet but the unboxing left much to be desired. The sturdy case already sustained damage in shipping and the IC was left loose in the container which led to several pins being damaged. That being said everything does seem to be here so we’ll see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Customer in the Midwest

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased about the wide variety of the components this kit came with it a small form-factor. One of the IC pins was bent but was no big deal to straighten. Each component was surprisingly good quality for the relatively inexpensive price. I would recommend this kit to anyone starting out with electronics or would like to create basic scientific equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: No drivers to install for the UNO CARD
customer_reviews.text: My computer never find a driver for tha card UNO. This is a china product. And i can do nothing with this kit ., un less somebody pas my a driver to install. The wich tha computer never find. Bat bat bat!
customer_reviews.author: frankyclassic

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my project. I had no idea about the components. But this kit had almost all the information I needed. My project well and I am so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sumi Rumba

customer_reviews.title: features
customer_reviews.text: What a great kit for the price... Super fast deliver also.. I will do business with them again for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Castiron1969

customer_reviews.title: Great as a kit, good sensor variety, BYO resistors.
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised. This kit has a decent stepper motor with the driver board, servos with 3 different arms, and includes a decent breadboard holder to mount stuff to. The resistors have skinny legs, so be careful of loose resistors in your projects, or spend a dollar on better ones. Has the better ribbon cable to connect the LCD panel. One of the better kits I have used.
customer_reviews.author: James Van Beek

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit that has a nice breadboard holder. Lots of parts to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis J. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Quick ship and it all works
customer_reviews.text: This kit arrived when it was supposed to and has provided hours and hours of educational entertainment for my son and I. The kit included everything it was supposed to. It was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son really enjoys it
customer_reviews.text: Kit has lots of useful items and my kids have been having fun experimenting with it. The ultrasonic sensor has been a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: julierider

customer_reviews.title: great project for a teenager or really any age
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to tinker with electronics and this is cool. the lights light up and move in a sequence.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 6

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: just as the description indicated ... it was easy to assemble. and good material
customer_reviews.author: Pty M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bargain and great lessons. My 12 yo grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Williams

customer_reviews.title: can't download softwere to practice tutorials
customer_reviews.text: product is good but with out tutorials not good for biginers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the product compared to the price it paid. It can be used to make many simple projects with the components included. Would definitely recommend to kids who love building arduino projects.
customer_reviews.author: ANINDA PRADHAN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for what’s included.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a week, and went through all of their projects included with the kit. The amount of parts included with this kit is pretty good for under $30. My only complaint is that the guides for the projects could be a little more detailed so people with little experience can understand the concepts a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron levan

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners kit at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I got everything setup quickly and easily and completed the first lesson within an hour. All parts work so far. It does have a lot of small pieces so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased. Great job to the Miuzei gang
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need. Every time I started to get up to get a screw driver or something, there it would be in the kit. After losing a bolt when putting together the station, I discovered they included an extra one. I'm very, very pleased. Great job to the Miuzei gang!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: It is great kit!
customer_reviews.text: got this for me and my son to work on some projects. It is great kit!
customer_reviews.author: Fazle

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot here great price and many projects A+
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with both service and product.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product and the quality of the components.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Lim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was ordering perfect items for making just about anything you could want to create.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Baron

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the product. It is exactly what it claims for. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Nilufer Koldan

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived within the specified time and was well packed and contained all the items as advertised. I am very happy indeed
customer_reviews.author: Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great. I am very happy working on it.
customer_reviews.author: José Alberto Forero Vásquez

product_meta.title: Miuzei Electronics Kit for Arduino Projects, Super Starter Kit Circuit BreadBorad Kit with LCD1602 Module, Breadboard, Servo, Sensors, LEDs and Detailed Tutorial MA05
product_meta.description:
Miuzei Basic Starter Kit for learning Arduino, we provide every detailed lessons for helping beginners to do the projects, we have tested all lessons before sold the products, we will be appreciated if there any arduino lovers give any suggestions or have a communication with us. Every component is strictly tested before delivery, feel free to buy it! 

Package Inclued: 
1x R3 Board
1x USB Cable
1x accrylic holder 
1x 830 tie-points Breadboard
1x LCD1602 Module (with Pin header)
1x 4-digit 7-segment Display
1x 7-Segment Display
1x Servo Motor(SG90)
1x ULN2003 Stepper Motor Driver Board 
1x Stepper Motor
1x Power Supply Module 
1x 9V Battery Holder 
1x Ultrasonic distance sensor
1x Water Lever Sensor
1x Joystick Module
1x IR Receiver Module
1x IR Remote Control
1x DHT - 11( Temperature and Humidity sensor) 
1x Thermistor
1x Active Buzzer 
1x Passive Buzzer
2x Diode Rectifier(1N4007)
2x 2N2222 Transistors
2x Potentiometer (10K)
2x Photoresistor
1x IC 74HC595
10X 10 pcs Resistor( 1M, 10R, 100R, 220R, 330R, 100K, 1K, 2K, 5.1K,10K, )
5x LEDs (White, Yellow, Blue, Green, Red,RGB)
1x 20 Pin Male to Female Jumper Wires 
1x 65 pcs Jumper Wire
1x Tilt Switch 
5x Buttons (Small)
feature_bullets: Starter Kit for Arduino contains 28 free lessons with detailed tutorial , tested & annotated code to help the beginners or engineers building Arduino project.
All modules come with soldered pin header or wire, compatible with Arduino R3 and all computer operating systems
Especially with acrylic holder to keep LCD1602 display, R3 board and breadboard together stably, easy to build a small experimental platform.
Over 160 components -- Complete Kit with R3 controller board, LCD display, Ultrasonic sensor ,Power Supply module and more commonly components like Jumper Wires，Led kits, Resistor, servo motor.
Portable to Carry-- Come with a sturdy box with dividers to keep the small stuff like LED, IC, buttons, diodes in the individual case.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
